mapper.insert: insert into `ajdataback`.`apartment_room_temp` (areaid, room_name, room_type_id, area, building_name, floor, rent, status, pay_method, source, house_code, room_type, sign_status, sign_time, create_time, update_time, shelves_time, off_shelves_time, backups_time, is_backups ) values (#{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{buildingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{houseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roomType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shelvesTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{offShelvesTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{backupsTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isBackups,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
